DOC.brief_summary: The investigators hypothesize that giving Dexmedetomidine in combination with Fentanyl for pediatric patients undergoing hypospadias surgery, will reduce the fentanyl requirement for intraoperative and postoperative analgesia.
DOC.criteria: Children aged 112 years undergoing hypospadias repair Allergy to Dexmedetomidine Preoperative use of sedatives or analgesics cardiac diseases Children with mental retardation
